title: Edge of darkness. Pt. 2
brief_description: Northmoor - Craven and renegade US agent Jedburgh, pursue their mission to discover the deadly secret of an underworld nuclear facility and begin a desperate race to avert catastrophe with the mysterious wisdom of GAIA. Rated: M
